game.name: LONE RUIN
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 반복 플레이할 가치가 높은 로그라이크 트윈 스틱 슈팅 게임에서 오래된 마법의 폐허로 모험을 떠나고 고대의 힘을 찾으세요. 마법을 최적화하고 궁극의 콤보를 만들어서 일그러진 흉물을 물리치고 Lone Ruin에 더 깊이 빠져보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Venture into an old, magical ruin to seek an ancient power in this highly replayable roguelike twin-stick shooter. Optimise spells and build ultimate combos to defeat twisted monstrosities and delve deeper into the Lone Ruin.

reviewHighlights.text: Thought they art style was cool at first but it becomes sort of a nightmare to focus on. The game play is okay but it feels like it is missing meat/su...
This game is a hidden gem for Hades and Binding of Isaac enjoyers. Also, the soundtrack is just awesome!
